Name: 0_murderer_killer_killed_murdering

Name: 1_insurance_unitedhealth_healthcare_medicare

UnitedHealthcare Group had a 32% claim denial rate in 2023, they've done more than just ruin people's lives, they've killed people. I don't think people who do OF kill thousands of people per year."]

Name: 3_healthcare_unitedhealth_insurance_ceos

The CEO of United Healthcare who used AI to deny health coverage to millions, Brian Thompson, was shot in the chest and died.

Anyway', 'And people wonder why health insurance CEOs are getting got. United Healthcare CEO Brian Thompson fucked around and found out with his AI that denied 90% of claims.']
